mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS "userId", user_pw AS "password", ismart_id AS "ismartId", user_type AS "userType", user_nm AS "userNm", role_name AS "roleName", use_yn AS "useYn", COALESCE(D.site_name,C.cust_nm) AS "siteName" FROM ems.user_bas A LEFT JOIN ems.role_bas B ON A.user_type = B.role_no LEFT JOIN ems.cyber_kepco_info C ON A.ismart_id = C.cust_no LEFT JOIN ems.total_Info D ON A.ismart_id = D.cust_no WHERE A.user_id = #{username} AND A.user_pw = CRYPT(#{password}, user_pw) LIMIT 1
